## 2ï¸âƒ£ KPI ê³„ì‚°

### (2) ê·¸ë£¹ë³„ í‰ê·  ì ìˆ˜

### (3) ê¸°ì¤€ ê·¸ë£¹ ëŒ€ë¹„ ì°¨ì´



ê·¸ë£¹ "A"ì˜ í‰ê·  ì ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ê¸°ì¤€ìœ¼ë¡œ í•˜ì—¬

ê° ê·¸ë£¹ì˜ ì ìˆ˜ ì°¨ì´ë¥¼ ê³„ì‚°í•˜ë¼.



ì •ì˜:ð‘‘ð‘–ð‘“ð‘“=ð‘šð‘’ð‘Žð‘›_ð‘ ð‘ð‘œð‘Ÿð‘’âˆ’ð‘šð‘’ð‘Žð‘›_ð‘ ð‘ð‘œð‘Ÿð‘’(ð´)

ê²°ê³¼ë¥¼ df_kpiì— diff ì»¬ëŸ¼ìœ¼ë¡œ ì¶”ê°€í•˜ë¼.



## 3ï¸âƒ£ ë¶„ì„



"A" ëŒ€ë¹„ ì ìˆ˜ê°€ ë” ë†’ì€ ê·¸ë£¹ì„

Python list better_groupsì— ì €ìž¥í•˜ë¼.



## 4ï¸âƒ£ ì‹œê°í™” (ì¡°ê±´ ì—„ìˆ˜)

Bar plot: ê·¸ë£¹ë³„ í‰ê·  ì ìˆ˜ (ìœ íš¨ ìƒ˜í”Œ ê¸°ì¤€)



figure size: (6, 4)



xì¶•: group



yì¶•: mean_score



bar color:



diff > 0 â†’ green



diff <= 0 â†’ gray

ylabel: "Mean Score"



grid: í‘œì‹œ âŒ



legend: í‘œì‹œ âŒ



yì¶• tickì€ ê¸°ë³¸ê°’ ì‚¬ìš© (ë”°ë¡œ ì„¤ì • âŒ)



ê·¸ë£¹ "A"ì˜ í‰ê·  ìœ„ì¹˜ì—

pandas + matplotlibë§Œ ì‚¬ìš©



for / while âŒ



ë¬¸ì œì— ì—†ëŠ” ì»¬ëŸ¼/ì‹œê° ìš”ì†Œ ì¶”ê°€ âŒ



ê²°ê³¼ ë³€ìˆ˜ëª… ì •í™•ížˆ ë§žì¶œ ê²ƒ (df_valid, df_kpi, better_groups)

# ë°ì´í„°

```python
import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame({
    "sample": ["S1","S2","S3","S4","S5","S6","S7","S8"],
    "group":  ["A","A","A","B","B","B","B","A"],
    "score":  [72, 85, 90, 60, 88, 92, 70, 95],
    "passed": [True, True, False, True, True, False, True, True]
})
display(df)
```

<div>
<style scoped>
    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {
        vertical-align: middle;

        vertical-align: top;

```python
df_valid = df[(df['passed']==True) & (df['score']>=80)]
df_kpi = df_valid.groupby('group')['score'].agg('mean').reset_index(name='mean_score')
mean_A = df_kpi[df_kpi['group']=='A']['mean_score'].item()
df_kpi['diff'] = df_kpi['mean_score']-mean_A
better_groups = df_kpi[df_kpi['mean_score'] > mean_A]['group'].to_list()
display(df_valid, df_kpi, better_groups)
```

```
[]
```

```python
df_kpi['color_bool'] = df_kpi['diff'] > 0
df_kpi['color'] = df_kpi['color_bool'].map({True: 'green', False: 'gray'})

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(6,4))

ax.bar(df_kpi['group'], df_kpi['mean_score'], color =df_kpi['color'].to_list() )
ax.set_title("Mean Score by Group (Valid Samples)")
ax.set_xlabel("Group")
ax.set_ylabel("Mean Score")
ax.grid(False)
ax.axhline(mean_A, color = 'gray', linestyle='--', linewidth=2)
```

```
<matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x18d07d118d0>
```
